info.name: Typography Riots @ RTM [remember the milk]
info.description:
You know how RTM looks like.. Well, the typefolk rioted screaming something about table borders, size, priority, and better font stacks. Things align now, magical right? The cow logo is gone, I might make that an option later, but currently makes space for a better status popup.

Top navmenu that appears faded on the screenie transitions to full opacity on hover.
info.additionalInfo:
Feb23b:
Total revamp, now the header appears as a fixed bar and saves a lot of wasted space up top, statuses appear from under it. Logo is back too. Also, no need for an option anymore about abbRTM
!!You might need to uninstall style, restart firefox, install again to keep updating possible because of my removal of the option, it's a stylish bug

Feb23:
Restyled sidebar to stay out of the way from the inbox a bit (for abbRTM as well)

Feb22b:
Decreased main font size a tad, will update screenie next update

Feb22:
-Total Revamp of add new task box and upper tools area
-Added an option about whether you have A bit Better RTM installed or not, this makes things align flush at the top after abbRTM moves the tabs to the side. 
-updated screenie

Feb21: Added tweaks for A Bit Better RTM, see screenshot. Remember though that a bit better rtm breaks fluid layout as it's resizing script only fires on window load, it does it regardless of my style [you have to refresh the browser if you resize it]. Ignore this if you don't use a bit better RTM.

This is all proper at the moment: February 21st 2014, dating it in case something breaks
CSS is not super organized yet, but properly spaced and all. Will keep working on this over time

with love y'all, queer those stylesheets
